text: Anthony Michael Varvaro (October 31, 1984 â€“ September 11, 2022) was an American professional baseball pitcher. He played in Major League Baseball (MLB) for the Seattle Mariners, Atlanta Braves, and Boston Red Sox from 2010 to 2015. He later became a police officer with the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey. Varvaro was born in Staten Island, New York City. Varvaro was killed in a car crash on September 11, 2022 in Jersey City, New Jersey at the age of 37. ==References== Category:1984 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Seattle Mariners players Category:Atlanta Braves players Category:Boston Red Sox players Category:American police officers Category:Sportspeople from New York City Category:Road accident deaths in New Jersey
title: Anthony Varvaro
